description: Drafted hospital-wide policies on medically inappropriate care & Do Not Attempt Resuscitation (DNAR) Prepared manuscript regarding Capes v. Kim (surrogate decision making & persistent-vegetative state

description: Acted as a medical scribe in the Emergency Department (2/2017—5/2017; ~15 hours/week) while still enrolled in undergraduate studies, and full time in the Department of Urology (5/2017—6/2018; 40+ hours/week).
